question: Where did Subhas Chandra Bose use his quotes "Give me blood, and I shall give you freedom" for the first time?
explanation: Even during the time of military reverses, S.C. Bose tried to maintain support for the Azad Hind movement wholeheartedly. During a rally of Indians in Burma on 4 July 1944, he used his quotes "Give me blood, and I shall give you freedom" as a part of the motivational speech.
